creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: double page from a book Tale of the Genji; two women in house with a deer, a man on horse and his attendants outside of her house
inscription:
[...] Once upon a time, a man met a woman in Kasugani Village in Nara (last half is the poem he sent to her)
Japanese:Mukashi otoko nara no miyako Kasugano no sato yori ???naru onna o mite \"Kasugano no ????\"
medium: From a woodblock printed book (sumizuri-e); ink on paper
title: Scene from Classical Literature
